name: Looted Network
description: Let’s $LOOT! The future of jackpots in crypto is on-chain. Explore our fast moving ‘Loot Boxes’ and try your luck against fellow traders, influencers and developers alike. 100% of Rake bought back into the Looted token. Summary Looted pioneers decentralized gaming utilising Chainlink VRF on Ethereum, offering a transparent and secure casino experience. Our Mission We're committed to redefining the gaming landscape by delivering fair and rewarding jackpot experiences within DeFi. Anonymous, trustless gaming. Our Vision We envision a community-driven ecosystem that revolutionises traditional gaming models with innovation and inclusivity. $Loot token drives the Looted Network ecosystem, empowering users with seamless participation and lucrative rewards.
